text.0: thou art the sapient son of dyaus o agni yes and the child of earth who knowest all things.
text.1: bring the gods specially thou sage for worship.
text.2: agni the wise bestows the might of heroes grants strengthening food preparing it for nectar.
text.3: thou who art rich in food bring the gods hither.
text.4: agni infallible lights earth and heaven immortal goddesses gracious to all men.
text.5: lord through his strength splendid through adorations.
text.6: come to the sacrifice agni and indra come to the offerers house who hath the soma.
text.7: come friendlyminded gods to drink the soma.
text.8: in the floods home art thou enkindled agni o jātavedas son of strength eternal.
text.9: exalting with thine help the gatheringplaces.
